title: Greta Van Susteren | C-SPAN.org
snippet: Greta Conway Van Susteren is an American commentator, lawyer, and former television news anchor for CNN, Fox News, and NBC News. She hosted Fox News's On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren for 14 years before departing for MSNBC, where she hosted For the Record with Greta for roughly six months ...

title: Greta Van Susteren
snippet: Former Fox News Star Greta Van Susteren Moves To MSNBC Former Fox News star Greta Van Susteren will debut on MSNBC next week with For the Record with Greta.

title: MSNBC fires Greta Van Susteren, replaces her with liberal host | Fox News
snippet: Greta Van Susteren is out at MSNBC less than six months after she started at the cable channel. Van Susteren broke the news of her own ouster Thursday, tweeting "I'm out at MSNBC" shortly before the network issued its own announcement.

title: Greta Van Susteren
snippet: Greta Van Susteren is Chief National Political Analyst for Gray Media and host of Full Court Press. She is an award-winning journalist and worked as a news anchor at CNN, Fox News Channel and MSNBC.
